      • shifter

        static java.lang.String shifter​(int index,
                                java.lang.String str)
        Used to help the Shift+Caesar and Shift+Vigenere hashing algorithms.
        Parameters:
        index - The Index of the Chararcter to shift
        str - The original String of the shifted Character
        Returns:
        The new String with the character shifted
